admreg: Europe and Central Asia,Europe and Central Asia
trustfund:
TF024792-KOSOVO-PILOT WATER SUPPLY PROJECT,TF039901-YUGOSALVIA,FED.REP.OF.(SER;MONT.)
            - KOSOVO EMERGENCY WATER PROJECT

abstracts.cdata!:
The Pilot Water Supply Project will
            improve the quality and efficiency of water supply provision
            in Kosovo. This environmental assessment reports how adverse
            environmental impacts will be mitigated. Sand, gravel, and
            other construction material will be sprayed or transported
            off site by a covered truck in order to reduce dust
            circulation, prevent disturbance of the riverbed and to
            maintain water quality. Hazardous materials will be handled
            by government-approved and -licensed companies. Metal will
            be removed from sites and deposited at authorized dealers
            for recycling. During the operational phase, the noise level
            will be reduced by limiting activities to reasonable hours.
            Equipment and machinery will be maintained so as to prevent
            water and fuel leaks and spills. Appropriate lighting and
            well-defined safety signs will promote pedestrian safety.
            Traffic will be controlled by using specified routes and
            hauling material during off-peak hours. Constructing
            channels to divert wastewater will alleviate water pollution.
